CustomField.description: This field temporarily holds the ID of a case that needs to be associated with a quote, when creating a quote from a case. Please note that this field should not be used for any other purpose and that the value is only intended as being held temporarily. Do not use on a page layout, with the exception of testing purposes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field temporarily holds the ID of a case that needs to be associated with a quote, when creating a quote from a case. Please note that this field should not be used for any other purpose and that the value is only intended as being held temporarily.
CustomField.label: Case for Quote
